item.title: Incessant, 4th August
item.description:
Incessant rubbish dumped rendering the pavement dangerous and a danger to the public. Please clear and consider installing cameras to dish out fines to those vehicles that pull up and dump their rubbish.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Downham Way, Chinbrook, London

item.title: Intense litter picking needed on Elcot Avenue, 4th August
item.description:
Can someone come through and remove all the litter that's on both pathways of Elcot Avenue, it never gets picked up and taken away

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Elcot Avenue, Peckham, London

item.title: Constant dog poo on the street, 4th August
item.description:
There is constantly dog poo on the road, I don't know where it comes from or who's to blame but it's non stop. Another one right outside my door step today. Council has put up signs but it seems to have made no difference, if anything it's got worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Waldegrave Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fan dumped on Elcot Avenue, 4th August
item.description:

item.title: Orange Square Painted on Wall of Elcot Avenue - Please wash off, 4th August
item.description:
Please can we get this orange painted square washed off our wall on Elcot Avenue. We requested a purple square be removed, instead a far larger, uglier orange square has now be painted over it. This has made things much worse. Please use the solvents to remove all this paint and bring back the brick wall as it was, it's not appropriate or acceptable to be painting squares over our natural brick wall. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Friary Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal fly tip outside Rothbury hall, 4th August
item.description:
Someone has Fly tipped outside our workplace offices at Rothbury hall. There is a matress and drawers left outside we believe this has been there for 2 days over the weekend
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mauritius Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 4th August
item.description:
Vehicle has been in the location for sometime, more than 2 years. Never seen anyone check the vehicle or enter or exit the vehicle. Vehicle Has flat tyres, gathering rubbish and no tax or MOT. Vehicle located exactly in front of the flats, across from the car park, next to the steps walkway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vicarage Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
